Text: Birdie (Street Fighter):  He debuted in the first "Street Fighter" as a non-playable character though he later made prominent appearances in the three "Street Fighter Alpha" games.

Text: Birdie (Street Fighter):  His first appearance depicted him as a late 1970s tall white British punk rocker, but he later reappeared in the "Alpha" series as a hulking black British punk.
